message: http://www.yankodesign.com for starters. Excellent (sometimes unrealistic) product design. One can't spend all day looking to web design for inspiration. :)
I like http://design-milk.com/ and http://mariebergeron.wordpress.com/ (a friends blog) as well
@micrypt thanks for sharing, it's like a candy shop for designers in there

@micrypt agreed! yanko is fabulous. i love smashing magazine, hongkiat, and six revisions. nettuts, david walsh, and line 25 have amazing tuts. stackoverflow is the only link like this in my bookmarks toolbar. it's my design & developing google. ;)
